title: Phase 0: Foundation & Setup
description: Project infrastructure, development environment, and team setup. Goal: Get the team productive and establish solid foundations.

title: Phase 1: MVP Release
description: Production-ready version of current functionality. PWA with offline support, health score visualization, statistics, and data export.

title: Phase 2: Enhancement & UX
description: Enhanced user experience with advanced visualizations, smart insights, gamification, and customization options.

title: Phase 3: Scale & Optimize
description: Backend implementation, cloud sync, performance optimization, analytics, and internationalization.

title: Phase 4: Advanced Features
description: AI capabilities, advanced health features, community features, and platform expansion.

title: v1.0.0 - Initial Release
description: First public release of the Health Tracker app
